name: Word Olympics
overview: Word Olympics is a 1 - 2 player spelling word game. Players have to solve anagrams by rearranging the letters present on the screen up to 8-letter words. The player rearranges the letters by selecting them from a 3 x 3 box with the joystick, and each correct letter choice is kept on the screen. Each correct answer causes a character to run a set distance across the top of the screen. The first player to help their character run the length of the screen is the winner. There a are multiple difficulty levels available.
